remarks.para: May be inoperative deactivated open provided:

numlitem.para: Equipment cooling system is operated in the NORMAL or STBY mode,
Both equipment cooling fans are operative, and

Procedures are established and used to verify main deck and forward lower lobe cargo compartment remains empty, or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Main deck cargo compartment and lower forward cargo compartment are empty, or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to the Equipment Cooling selector "INBD EXH VLV INOP OPEN". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: TO DEACTIVATE INBOARD EXHAUST VALVE open:
Position the Temperature Control panel (P5) EQUIP COOLING selector to STBY.
Open the P414 panel EQUIP COOL CONT VLV INBD circuit breaker.
Gain access to inoperative inboard exhaust valve (AMM 21-58-23/401).
Disconnect, cap, and stow electrical connector from Exhaust Valve.
Close the P414 panel EQUIP COOL CONT VLV INBD circuit breaker.
Determine Inboard Exhaust Valve position. If not already open, manually position valve in the OPEN position.

note.para: The status message EE CLNG INBD EXH may remain annunciated.
